Created an attachment (id=52359)
Changes u's with umlauts to plain u's

I don't think part of this test included trying to test support for ISO-8859-1 (8-bit character) tolerance, so I have just removed the u's with umlauts and replaced them with regular u's.  With this change, the test passes when using the IBM JRE.

Searched code and tests for umlauts and fixed them all.

Available in builds > N20061020-0010.
